name: Haar
description: Haar is a randomly generated maze for you to explore while you listen to the tracks, Haar 14, Haar 15, Haar 1, Haar 5 and Haar 17, from the Haar Series of Albums, by Fraser A Campbell. It features four clarinets (Haar), four violins (Francesca Dardani - Haar II) and four vocals (Dafney - Haar III) that are positioned throughout the maze. As you move around, the sound of each instrument will get louder or softer depending on how close you are. Each instrument can be found on the map with a blue, green or pink dot, while you, the player are represented by a Red dot. Enjoy exploring Haar and if you'd like to hear the full albums, please visit: http://www.fraser-campbell.com/haar-1
